hadith.english: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
Make things easy and do not make them difficult, cheer the people up by conveying glad tidings to them and do not repulse (them).

dua.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
dua.english: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

dua.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
dua.english: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and in the Hereafter.
O Allah, guide me and keep me steadfast.
